title: Need help with PBE
body:
I want to be a PBE tester. They said I have the application but I don't think I can use it.

Is it normal?

replies.body: I'm not entirely sure I understand you. You can apply for PBE access using [**this link**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). If you're having trouble with this page, please let me know.
